creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Panel, embroidered in needlepoint with a diapered ground and interlocking medallions of two sizes containing stylized flowers and various religious and good luck symbols.  Shades of blue, green, orange, yellow, red and pearl grey.  Narrow binding of yellow satin brocade.  Lining of blue silk.
title: Panel
